project_name: 法国电子探戈组合 Tangomotán

venue_info.venue_address: 北京市朝阳区神路街39号地下一层 DDC酒吧

project_info:
9/15 20:30 法国电子探戈组合 Tangomotán (FR., Europe Electro Tango)
 
融合原声和电子乐，全新探戈舞蹈体验
Entre acoustique et électro, instrumental et beatmaking, sensualité et gravité_
 
继2019前2张专辑后，来自法国的Tangomotán组合于今年3月发行了全新的第3张专辑《Motán》。
After their last 2 previous albums, Tangomotán presents their third one "Motán", released worldwide on 15 March 2024.

新专辑《Motán》创新性地将原声与电子乐、探戈舞蹈音乐巧妙融合。四位来自法国管弦乐团的音乐家将传统和现代进行了有机融合。他们以独特的方式带领大家进入全新的探戈世界，同时再次强调了音乐与舞蹈作为完美有机体的普遍认知。

Reconnecting with tango danse, a fusion of acoustic and electronical music: this is the project of that new album. While respecting the disruptions and emphasis of the musical genre, these four musicians, coming from orchestra french ensembles, merge a wide range of traditional and modern works. They are immersed in the tango world on their own way and remind the universality of music and danse reunited.

场内禁烟，文明观演，勿妨碍他人观演。
